name: roo-state-manager
description: MCP server for unified Roo state management and conversation persistence

scripts.pretest: npm run build && npm run build:tests
scripts.test: npm run test:setup && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--experimental-vm-modules --max-old-space-size=4096" jest --runInBand
scripts.test:unit: npm run test:setup && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--experimental-vm-modules --max-old-space-size=4096" jest tests/unit --runInBand
scripts.test:integration: npm run test:setup && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--experimental-vm-modules --max-old-space-size=4096" jest tests/integration --runInBand
scripts.test:coverage: npm run pretest && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--experimental-vm-modules --max-old-space-size=4096" jest --coverage --runInBand
scripts.test:hierarchy: npm run pretest && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--experimental-vm-modules --max-old-space-size=4096" jest --runInBand tests/unit/services/hierarchy-reconstruction-engine.test.ts
scripts.test:e2e: npm run pretest && npm run test:e2e:run
scripts.test:all: npm run pretest && npm run test && npm run test:detector
